topic.title: EMS Physical Assessment Section - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL conform to Derived CDA Section
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67668-4" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text
SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] title

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry
Such entrys SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.03
Such entrys MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="8335-2" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ
UCUM units should be 'kg'
Such entrys MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67670-0" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet LengthBasedTapeMeasure 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.24 STATIC
Such entrys MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67524-9" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet SkinAssessment 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.25 STATIC
Such entrys MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67525-6" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet HeadAssessmentFinding 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.26 STATIC
Such entrys MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67526-4" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet FaceAssessmentFinding 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.27 STATIC
Such entrys MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67527-2" Neck assessment finding (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet NeckAssessmentFinding 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.28 STATIC
Such entrys MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67528-0" Chest and lungs assessment (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ChestLungAssessmentFinding 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.29 STATIC
Such entrys MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67529-8" Heart assessment finding (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet HeartAssessmentFinding 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.30 STATIC
Such entrys MAY contain zero or more [0..*] component
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67530-6" Abdomen assessment (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet AbdomenAssessmentFinding 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.31 STATIC
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] targetSiteCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet AbdominalFindingLocation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.32 STATIC
Such entrys MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67531-4" Pelvic and genitourinary assessment (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet PelvisGenitourinaryAssessment 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.33 STATIC
Such entrys MAY contain zero or more [0..*] component
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67532-2" Back and spine assessment (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] targetSiteCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet BackSpineFindingLocation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.35 STATIC
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet BackSpineAssessmentFinding 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.34 STATIC
Such entrys MAY contain zero or more [0..*] component
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67533-0" Extremities assessment (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
Such components MAY contain exactly one [1..1] targetSiteCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ExtremityFindingLocation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.37 STATIC
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ExtremitiesAssessmentFinding 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.36 STATIC
Such entrys MAY contain zero or more [0..*] component
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67534-8" Eye assessment (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] targetSiteCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet EyeFindingLocation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.39 STATIC
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet EyeAssessmentFinding 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.38 STATIC
Such entrys MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component MAY contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67535-5" Mental status assessment (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet MentalStatusFinding 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.84 STATIC
Such entrys MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67536-3" Neurological status assessment (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet NeurologicalAssessmentFinding 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.40 STATIC

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entry
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67471-3" Patient Pregnancy (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Pregnancy 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.42 STATIC

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entry
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67517-3" Last oral intake (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type TS

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="30525-0" Patient age (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ
UCUM units SHOULD be 'a'

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entry
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67523-1" Contraindications to thrombolytic use (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This entry SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ExistenceOfContraindicationsToThrombolyticUse 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.41 STATIC

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67523-1" Barriers to patient care (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This entry SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet BarrierToCare 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.85 STATIC
SHALL conform to Derived CDA Section
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67668-4" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] title
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry
Such entrys SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="DRIV"
Contains exactly one [1..1] Derived CDA Section Entry (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.24)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry
Such entrys SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime
